  • Method Details

    • createToken

      public EmailVerificationToken createToken​(User user, String token)
      The function creates an email verification token for a user and saves it in the repository.
      Parameters:
      user - The "user" parameter is an instance of the User class, which represents a user in the system. It contains information about the user, such as their username, email, and password.
      token - The "token" parameter is a string that represents the verification token generated for the user's email verification process.
      Returns:
      The method is returning an instance of the EmailVerificationToken class.

    • findByToken

      public Optional<EmailVerificationToken> findByToken​(String token)
      The function findByToken searches for an EmailVerificationToken object in the emailVerificationTokenRepo repository based on a given token.
      Parameters:
      token - The token parameter is a string that represents the token value used to search for an email verification token in the emailVerificationTokenRepo repository.
      Returns:
      The method is returning an Optional object that contains an EmailVerificationToken.

    • delete

      public void delete​(EmailVerificationToken emailVerificationToken)
      The function deletes an email verification token from the repository.
      Parameters:
      emailVerificationToken - The emailVerificationToken parameter is an object of the EmailVerificationToken class.
